verses.verse: To every <WH3605> thing there is a season, <WH2165> and a time <WH6256> to every <WH3605> purpose <WH2656> under <WH8478> the heaven: <WH8064>
A time <WH6256> to be born, <WH3205> and a time <WH6256> to die; <WH4191> a time <WH6256> to plant, <WH5193> and a time <WH6256> to pluck up <WH6131> that which is planted; <WH5193>
A time <WH6256> to kill, <WH2026> and a time <WH6256> to heal; <WH7495> a time <WH6256> to break down, <WH6555> and a time <WH6256> to build up; <WH1129>
A time <WH6256> to weep, <WH1058> and a time <WH6256> to laugh; <WH7832> a time <WH6256> to mourn, <WH5594> and a time <WH6256> to dance; <WH7540>

A time <WH6256> to cast away <WH7993> stones, <WH68> and a time <WH6256> to gather stones together; <WH3664> <WH68> a time <WH6256> to embrace, <WH2263> and a time <WH6256> to refrain <WH7368> from embracing; <WH4480> <WH2263>
A time <WH6256> to get, <WH1245> and a time <WH6256> to lose; <WH6> a time <WH6256> to keep, <WH8104> and a time <WH6256> to cast away; <WH7993>
A time <WH6256> to rend, <WH7167> and a time <WH6256> to sew; <WH8609> a time <WH6256> to keep silence, <WH2814> and a time <WH6256> to speak; <WH1696>
A time <WH6256> to love, <WH157> and a time <WH6256> to hate; <WH8130> a time <WH6256> of war, <WH4421> and a time <WH6256> of peace. <WH7965>
What <WH4100> profit <WH3504> hath he that worketh <WH6213> in that wherein <WH834> he <WH1931> laboreth? <WH6001>
I have seen <WH7200> <WH853> the travail, <WH6045> which <WH834> God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> to the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> to be exercised <WH6031> in it.

He hath made <WH6213> <WH853> every <WH3605> thing beautiful <WH3303> in his time: <WH6256> also <WH1571> he hath set <WH5414> <WH853> the world <WH5769> in their heart, <WH3820> so that <WH834> no <WH4480> <WH1097> man <WH120> can find out <WH4672> <WH853> the work <WH4639> that <WH834> God <WH430> maketh <WH6213> from the beginning <WH4480> <WH7218> to <WH5704> the end. <WH5490>
I know <WH3045> that <WH3588> there is no <WH369> good <WH2896> in them, but <WH518> for <WH3588> a man to rejoice, <WH8055> and to do <WH6213> good <WH2896> in his life. <WH2416>

And also <WH1571> that every man should eat <WH7945> <WH398> <WH3605> <WH120> and drink, <WH8354> and enjoy <WH7200> the good <WH2896> of all <WH3605> his labor, <WH5999> it <WH1931> is the gift <WH4991> of God. <WH430>

I know <WH3045> that, <WH3588> whatsoever <WH3605> <WH834> God <WH430> doeth, <WH6213> it <WH1931> shall be <WH1961> forever: <WH5769> nothing <WH369> can be put <WH3254> to <WH5921> it, nor <WH369> any thing taken <WH1639> from <WH4480> it: and God <WH430> doeth <WH6213> it, that men should fear <WH7945> <WH3372> before <WH4480> <WH6440> him.

That which hath been <WH4100> <WH7945> <WH1961> is now; <WH3528> and that <WH1931> which <WH834> is to be <WH1961> hath already <WH3528> been; <WH1961> and God <WH430> requireth <WH1245> <WH853> that which is past. <WH7291>

And moreover <WH5750> I saw <WH7200> under <WH8478> the sun <WH8121> the place <WH4725> of judgment, <WH4941> that wickedness <WH7562> was there; <WH8033> and the place <WH4725> of righteousness, <WH6664> that iniquity <WH7562> was there. <WH8033>

I <WH589> said <WH559> in mine heart, <WH3820> God <WH430> shall judge <WH8199> <WH853> the righteous <WH6662> and the wicked: <WH7563> for <WH3588> there is a time <WH6256> there <WH8033> for every <WH3605> purpose <WH2656> and for <WH5921> every <WH3605> work. <WH4639>

I <WH589> said <WH559> in mine heart <WH3820> concerning <WH5921> the estate <WH1700> of the sons <WH1121> of men, <WH120> that God <WH430> might manifest <WH1305> them, and that they <WH1992> might see <WH7200> that they <WH7945> themselves are beasts. <WH929>

For <WH3588> that which befalleth <WH4745> the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> befalleth <WH4745> beasts; <WH929> even one thing <WH259> befalleth <WH4745> them: as the one <WH2088> dieth, <WH4194> so <WH3651> dieth <WH4194> the other; <WH2088> yea, they have all <WH3605> one <WH259> breath; <WH7307> so that a man <WH120> hath no <WH369> preeminence <WH4195> above <WH4480> a beast: <WH929> for <WH3588> all <WH3605> is vanity. <WH1892>
All <WH3605> go <WH1980> unto <WH413> one <WH259> place; <WH4725> all <WH3605> are <WH1961> of <WH4480> the dust, <WH6083> and all <WH3605> turn to dust again. <WH7725> <WH413> <WH6083>

Who <WH4310> knoweth <WH3045> the spirit <WH7307> of man <WH120> that <WH1931> goeth <WH5927> upward, <WH4605> and the spirit <WH7307> of the beast <WH929> that <WH1931> goeth <WH3381> downward <WH4295> to the earth? <WH776>

Wherefore I perceive <WH7200> that <WH3588> there is nothing <WH369> better, <WH2896> than that <WH4480> <WH834> a man <WH120> should rejoice <WH8055> in his own works; <WH4639> for <WH3588> that <WH1931> is his portion: <WH2506> for <WH3588> who <WH4310> shall bring <WH935> him to see <WH7200> what shall be <WH4100> <WH7945> <WH1961> after <WH310> him?
